sentences.english: Blame every problem in a project on the offshore team.
sentences.chinese: 把项目中所有的问题都怪罪在离岸团队头上。

sentences.english: And don't blame any of this on peacenik liberals.
sentences.chinese: 不要把这些都怪罪在反战自由人士身上。

sentences.english: Eliminating problems by transferring the blame to ananpeople else is frequently cwhichleed scape-goating.
sentences.chinese: 用怪罪别人的技巧来解决疑难通常被称为找寻替罪羊。

sentences.english: So, if Bush's condolences never come, he'll have nobody to blame but himself.
sentences.chinese: 所以，如果等不来布什总统的回礼，也不能怪罪人家。

sentences.english: Attempts to blame England’s recent riots on youth unemployment were overhasty.
sentences.chinese: 试图把应该最近的暴乱怪罪于青年失业是过于草率的。

sentences.english: Ep703 - Shimin owes a gambling debt. He even blames Jiahui for his misfortune.
sentences.chinese: 世民欠下巨额赌债，却怪罪嘉惠，嘉惠伤心。

sentences.english: FFS, why are people blaming the government for this when it's blatently the parents fault?
sentences.chinese: 本身是家长的错误，为什么人们要怪罪政府。

sentences.english: But no, I cannot and will not blame him.
sentences.chinese: 但是，不，我不能也不会怪罪他。

sentences.english: That's like blaming gravity for the glass you broke.
sentences.chinese: 那好比打破杯子却怪罪地心吸力。

sentences.english: It is, though Mr Zadari is mostly not to blame.
sentences.chinese: 形势虽然如此，但这不能主要怪罪于扎尔达里。

sentences.english: To criminate others and excuse ourselves is always an evidence of ignorance.
sentences.chinese: 怪罪别人而宽恕自己永远是愚蠢的表现。

sentences.english: Probably as a result, people are starting to blame harsh weather on global warming.
sentences.chinese: 也许结果就是，人们开始把恶劣天气怪罪于全球变暖。

sentences.english: Dont blame ZhangLiHua said on the spot.
sentences.chinese: 当场表示不会怪罪张丽华。

sentences.english: Nan ning mother kind dont want to blame act of parliament.
sentences.chinese: 楠宁妈妈善良的不想在怪罪帕莱。

definition: to take one's anger out on sb (who does not deserve it)
to involve/to implicate sb/to spread to others (harm, trouble, damage etc)
to offend sb/to give offense/to displease
to shield (a miscreant) from punishment, criticism etc/to take sb's side
